title: WhatsApp Issues Emergency Update for Zero-Click Exploit Targeting iOS and macOS Devices
description: WhatsApp has addressed a security vulnerability in its messaging apps for Apple iOS and macOS that it said may have been exploited in the wild in conjunction with a recently disclosed Apple flaw in targeted zero-day attacks.
